translations: n.[力]振动；振幅（oscillation 的复数形式）

phrs.translation: 阻尼振荡；阻尼振动；减幅振荡

sentences.sentence: There have always been slight oscillations in world temperature.
sentences.translation: 全球气温一直在轻微地波动。

sentences.sentence: The amplifier has a power isolation circuit and bandwidth limiting to reduce oscillations and motorboating.
sentences.translation: 该放大器具有电源隔离电路和带宽限制，以减少振荡和汽船排气声。

sentences.sentence: Here I have 256 oscillations per second.
